Title: Kimi no Kimochi
Description: ['Music video for the song ', Kimi no Kimochi, " sung by Satoshin (Shin Satou), a well know picture book writer, and Rina (Rina Hatakeyama), a famous child actress, that was featured on NHK's Minna no Uta program. The song was released as a maxi single that same month. The video was animated by Yoshiko Misumi."]
Related: ['Prequel: Kkoma Bus Tayo 4', 'Side story: Tayo-ui Jangnangam Adventure', 'Sequel: Tayo-ui Gonglyong Adventure']
